Investor_3_pre_2.name: Maria Rossi
Investor_3_pre_2.content: I have shown caution in investment decisions by rejecting a profit allocation plan that I deemed unfair. Seeking trustworthiness and competence from future trustees is essential for my reputation.

Investor_3_pre_4.name: Maria Rossi
Investor_3_pre_4.content: I have consistently demonstrated caution and ethical standards in my investment practices. I engaged with a trustee who proposed a fair allocation plan, which I accepted, reinforcing my commitment to collaboration for mutual gain. My previous rejections of unfair plans emphasize my vigilance in protecting my financial interests. Overall, I am viewed as a cautious and ethical investor dedicated to achieving trustworthy and competent partnerships.
